puakma.system
Class RequestPath

java.lang.Object
  puakma.system.RequestPath
public class RequestPath
extends java.lang.Object

The RequestPath object is used to make and parse URIs to Tornado applications.

Author:
bupson

RequestPath

public RequestPath(java.lang.String sFullPath)
Create a new obect from the URL "/group/database.pma/designelement?Action&Parameters". May be:

/database.pma /group/database.pma /group/database.pma/designelement

Parameters:
sFullPath - the full URI, eg "/group/database.pma/designelement?Action&Parameters"
Method Detail

setFullPath

public void setFullPath(java.lang.String sFullPath)
This is the main method where the parsing occurs

Parameters:
sFullPath - the full URI, eg "/group/database.pma/designelement?Action&Parameters"

isPuakmaApplication

public boolean isPuakmaApplication()
Determine if this URL is for a Puakma application on this server. This is based on the file type, usually ".pma"

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
For debugging purposes display the internal parts of this object as a string

getPathToApplication

public java.lang.String getPathToApplication()
Gets the path up to and including the application used to construct an URL mostly for determining image paths relative to the app.

getPathToDesign

public java.lang.String getPathToDesign()
Gets the path up to and including the design element used to construct an URL mostly for SavePage

removeParameter

public void removeParameter(java.lang.String sParamName)
Removes a parameter from the document.

Parameters:
sParamName - the name of the parameter to remove.

getParameter

public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String sParamName)
Returns a parameter value from the URI. Return null if the parameter name does not exist

Parameters:
sParamName - the name of the paraameter value to return
Returns:
the value of the named parameter as a String. Returns null if the parameter does not exist.

getFullPath

public java.lang.String getFullPath()
Gets the full path including the parameters used to construct an URL mostly for SavePage and redirect

Returns:
the full URI including design element, action and any parameters
